com.xebialabs.overthere

Class ConnectionOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebialabs.overthere.ConnectionOptions

  • public class ConnectionOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents options to use when creating a connection.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ADDRESS
      Common connection option that specifies the address to connect to.
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
      Connection option (Integer) for all protocol that specifies the connection timeout in milliseconds to use.
      static int DEFAULT_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS
      Default value (120000) for the connection option that specifies the connection timeout in milliseconds to use.
      static boolean DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
      Default value (true) for the connection option that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.
      static int DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
      Default value (100) for the connection option that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.
      static java.lang.String JUMPSTATION
      Common connection option (ConnectionOptions) that specifies the connection options to be used to create a tunnel.
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_COPY_COMMAND
      Common connection option (ConnectionOptions) that specifies the command to execute when doing a local copy on the remote host.
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_COPY_COMMAND_UNIX_DEFAULT_VALUE
      Default value (cp -pr {0} {1}) for the common connection option that specifies the command to execute on a UNIX host when doing a local copy.
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_COPY_COMMAND_WINDOWS_DEFAULT_VALUE
      Default value (copy {0} {1}) for the common connection option that specifies the command to execute on a Windows host when doing a local copy.
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_COPY_COMMAND_ZOS_DEFAULT_VALUE
      Default value (cp -pr {0} {1}) for the common connection option that specifies the command to execute on a Z/OS host when doing a local copy.
      static java.lang.String OPERATING_SYSTEM
      Connection option for all protocols that specifies the operating system to connect to.
      static java.lang.String PASSWORD
      Common connection option that specifies the password with which to connect.
      static java.lang.String PORT
      Common connection option that specifies the port to connect to.
      static java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
      Connection option (Boolean) for most protocols that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.
      static java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH
      Connection option for most protocols that specifies the directory in which the connection-scope temporary directory is created.
      static java.lang.String TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
      Connection option (Integer) for most protocol that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.
      static java.lang.String USERNAME
      Common connection option that specifies the username with which to connect.

    • Field Detail

      • OPERATING_SYSTEM

        public static final java.lang.String OPERATING_SYSTEM
        Connection option for all protocols that specifies the operating system to connect to. This is used to determine how to encode paths and commands and to determine the default temporary directory path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_PATH
        Connection option for most protocols that specifies the directory in which the connection-scope temporary directory is created. Any OverthereConnection.getTempFile(String) temporary file created, will be created in this directory.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT

        public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
        Connection option (Boolean) for most protocols that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_DIRECTORY_DELETE_ON_DISCONNECT
        Default value (true) for the connection option that specifies whether to delete the connection-scope temporary directory when the connection is closed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES

        public static final java.lang.String TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
        Connection option (Integer) for most protocol that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES

        public static final int DEFAULT_TEMPORARY_FILE_CREATION_RETRIES
        Default value (100) for the connection option that specifies how many times to retry creating a unique temporary file name before giving up.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS

        public static final java.lang.String CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MILLIS

        public static final java.lang.String LOCAL_COPY_COMMAND_UNIX_DEFAULT_VALUE
